rules_text:
Multikicker {E}{E} [i](You may pay an additional {E}{E} any number of times as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Choose any nonplayer target, then choose another nonplayer target for each time this spell was kicked. Pincer Maneuver deals X damage to each of them. If Pincer Maneuver wasn't kicked, you get {E}{E}.
